languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад примирительно поднимает руку.{/n} "Прости мою настойчивость. Не мне сомневаться в вере то{mf|го|й}, что прош{mf|ел|ла} крещение огнем".
{n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад примирительно поднимает руку.{/n} "Прости мою настойчивость. Не мне сомневаться в вере то{mf|го|й}, что прош{mf|ел|ла} крещение огнем".

{n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."
{n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."
{n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德举起手，做了个安抚的手势。{/n}“抱歉，请原谅我的坚持。你已经通过了烈焰的考验，我这么说并不是在怀疑你的信仰。”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德举起手，做了个安抚的手势。{/n}“抱歉，请原谅我的坚持。你已经通过了烈焰的考验，我这么说并不是在怀疑你的信仰。”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad levanta la mano en gesto apaciguador.{/n} «Por favor, perdone mi insistencia. No seré yo quien ponga en duda la fe de alguien que acaba de superar una prueba de fuego».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad levanta la mano en gesto apaciguador.{/n} «Por favor, perdone mi insistencia. No seré yo quien ponga en duda la fe de alguien que acaba de superar una prueba de fuego».

languages.text: {n}エデルスラドは、なだめるように手をかざした。{/n}「お願い、聞き分けのない私を許してくれ。私は炎の試練を乗り越えた者の信仰を疑う立場ではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドはなだめるように手をかざした。{/n}「祈りよ、聞き分けのない私を許してください。炎の試練を乗り越えた{mf|彼|彼女}の信仰を疑うのは私ではありません」
{n}エデルスラドは、なだめるように手をかざした。{/n}「お願い、聞き分けのない私を許してくれ。私は炎の試練を乗り越えた者の信仰を疑う立場ではない」

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad lève la main en signe d'apaisement.{/n} « Je vous en prie, pardonnez mon insistance. Loin de moi l'idée de remettre en question la foi de {mf|celui|celle} qui a survécu à l'épreuve du feu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad lève la main en signe d'apaisement.{/n} « Je vous en prie, pardonnez mon insistance. Loin de moi l'idée de remettre en question la foi de {mf|celui|celle} qui a survécu à l'épreuve du feu. »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad hebt beschwichtigend eine Hand.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht meine Beharrlichkeit. Ich werde sicher nicht am Glauben {mf|desjenigen zweifeln, der|derjenigen zweifeln, die} eine Feuerprobe bestanden hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad hebt beschwichtigend eine Hand.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht meine Beharrlichkeit. Ich werde sicher nicht am Glauben {mf|desjenigen zweifeln, der|derjenigen zweifeln, ´die} eine Feuerprobe bestanden hat."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad, ellerini sakinleştirici bir biçimde kaldırıyor.{/n} "Lütfen ısrarımı mazur gör. Ateşin sınavından geçmiş birinin inancından şüphe etmek bana düşmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad holds up his hand in a placating gesture.{/n} "Pray, forgive my insistence. I shall not be the one to doubt the faith of {mf|he|she} who has passed a trial by fire."
